form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Registration for Classification as Refugee, I-590 ( (Rev. 11-13-92)Y

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/26/2023 OF Almeo U.S. Department of Justice HASSen OMB No. 1115-0057 Immigration and Naturalization Service Registration for Classification as Refugee Type or print the following information. (Read instructions on reverse) A File No.: A71666 1. Name: (First) (Middle) (Last) AHMED HASSAN 2. Present address: OMAR O Box (4147 DiRE DAWA + Ethiopia 3. Date of birth: (month/day/year) Place of birth (city or town) (Province) (Country) Present nationality: Jan - 1904 KiSMAYO LOWER JUBA somalia SOMALI 4. Country from which I fled or was displaced: From Mogadishu Somalia On or about (month/day/year): 1991 March DOA 5. Reasons (State in detail): Et THE TRIBAL WAR of SOMALIA AND AL50 LOSTALL my PROPERTY AND CAPITAL AND ALSO HAWIYE TRIBE KILLED My CHILDREN AND My RELATIVES HAWIYE TRIBE Boys BEAT ME TILL my MOUTH AND ANUS BLOODING AND ALSO MENTAL I wo YEARS THAT WAS THE KEASONE'S 1 FLED my COUNTRY 6. My presentimmigration status in ETIHO PIA is: Asylum sector St AMINA Aw-Mohamed" MARR: in which residing) 1949 - DIED 1972 - 9ch Evidence of my immigration status is: (2nh) KHADIJA HASSAN MARR 1959 Div: 1965 - 2ch- thispia (Describe) MARR 1963 Tradil-8ch - 7. 3109 Name of spouse: HAWEYO 8.
